sent.orig: Every nation has its own traditions, its own values, its own aspirations.
sent.trans: 每个国家都有它自己的传统，自己的价值，自己的愿望。

sent.orig: She was buying on her own initiative, with her own money and at her own risk.
sent.trans: 耿芳是用她自己的钱主动购买的彩票，自担风险。

sent.orig: Pride is his own glass, his own trumpet his own chronicle.
sent.trans: 骄傲是他自己的镜子，是他自己的喇叭，是他自己的史册。

sent.orig: Each blows his own bugle and sings his own tune -- each does things in his own way.
sent.trans: 各吹各的号，各唱各的调。

sent.orig: It has its own capital city (Edinburgh) , its own law, and its own stamps.
sent.trans: 它有自己的首都（爱丁堡）、自己的法律、自己的邮票。
